Sentencas: The structural integrity of the sealing material is critical for the reliability of solid oxide fuel cell stacks.
Titulo: Flexural Strength and Viscosity of Glass Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks

Sentencas: In this respect failure and deformation are aspects which need to be assessed in particular for glass ceramic sealant materials.
Titulo: Flexural Strength and Viscosity of Glass Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks

Sentencas: Bending tests were carried at room temperature and typical stack operation temperature for glass ceramic sealants with different crystallization levels.
Titulo: Flexural Strength and Viscosity of Glass Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks

Sentencas: Elastic moduli, fracture stresses, and viscosity values are reported.
Titulo: Flexural Strength and Viscosity of Glass Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks

Sentencas: In addition to sintered bars some bending testing were carried out for steel specimens that were head-to-head joined with the glass ceramics similar as in a stack application.
Titulo: Flexural Strength and Viscosity of Glass Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks

Sentencas: The ceramic particle reinforced sealant material was screen printed onto the steel.
Titulo: Flexural Strength and Viscosity of Glass Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks

Sentencas: The results reveal a decrease of the strength for the partially crystallized sealant at operation relevant temperatures that can be associated with the viscous deformation of the material.
Titulo: Flexural Strength and Viscosity of Glass Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks
